item.title: Do not go gentle into that good night
item.description: 《不要温和地走进那个良夜》是英国诗人狄兰·托马斯创作于20世纪中期的诗歌，写给他病危中的父亲，该诗歌表达了诗人对于死神将可爱的人们带离这个世界的愤怒，即“怒斥光明的消逝”。 Do not go gentle into that good night, Old age should burn and rave at close of day; Rage, rage against the dying of the light. Though wise men at their end know dark is right, Because their words had forked no lightning they Do not go gentle into that good night. Good men, the last wave by, crying how bright Their frail deeds might have danced in a green bay,
